metadata.Title: CVE-2021-31871 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in klibc before 2.0.9. An integer overflow in the cpio command may result in a NULL pointer dereference on 64-bit systems.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> only used in initramfs, doesn't parse untrusted data

criterions.comment: klibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
